Thank you for spending your time checking out our latest offer.

Our customers asked for a long time, “HOW ABOUT KVM?”

Over the past several months HostUS worked on building out our custom [Breeze Panel](https://hostus.us/panel.html) to support KVM virtualisation. Not long ago, we soft launched KVM to existing customers... and

**Today, HostUS is relaunching KVM to the general public!**

We realise KVM is 'complex' to some buyers who like the automatic OS installation approach in
OpenVZ via templates. So we support similar automatic installation images in KVM (“Auto
Rebuild Templates”). For those who like to tweak their OS installs, we also support ISO
installations. You can use either from within the Breeze control panel. Yes, KVM will run
Windows, BSD and other OSes that OpenVZ cannot.

We know many customers might not understand the differences between KVM and OpenVZ,
besides one costing more. We have a short comparison of these virtualisation types here:
https://hostus.us/openvz-vs-kvm.html. 

If you still have questions about which virtualisation is best for your use, contact our Sales team directly:
https://my.hostus.us/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=1

**Performance + Reliability + Support = HostUS**

For our KVM hostnodes we are using single / dual Xeon CPUs, DDR3 / DDR4 RAM, backed by drives configured in RAID 10 and with a SSD cache on top. Connectivity is gigabit speed (shared / fair use).
